snippet.title: Resonant Tale - Reveal Trailer (Playdate)
snippet.description:
Meet quirky characters and explore a pocket sized puzzle box world in this no filler low combat classic handheld adventure, only on Playdate!

FOLLOW THE GAME https://orangethiefgames.itch.io/resonant-tale
FOLLOW ORANGE THIEF https://mastodon.social/@OrangeThief

*GAMEPLAY*

- Discover a lovingly handcrafted world densely packed with puzzles and secrets
- Delve into four trap laden levels, from escaping the depths of a castle dungeon to exploring an abandoned mountaintop temple
- Meet and greet with a cast of recurring characters whose lives progress throughout the game
- Bust up with off-beat bosses in a variety of memorable encounters
- Find and collect hidden treasure to earn piratey prizes

*FEATURES*

- 2-3 hours of estimated gameplay
- 30+ original music tracks from Rupert Cole
- Autosave
- Assistance options to toggle player damage, bosses, crank usage and timing puzzles
- Unlockable "hardcore" mode for a bonus challenge
- Lots of secrets!

*AWAKEN 2023*

GAME by Scott Hall https://orkn.uk/
MUSIC by Rupert Cole https://www.rupertcole.co.uk/
TRAILER by JezoShow https://twitter.com/JezoShow
COVER ART by Lily Hoang-Zhu https://www.instagram.com/liliuhms/

This trailer was created with non-final footage from an unfinished build running on the Playdate simulator, some minor differences to the finished game should be expected.

WEBSITE https://orangethief.co.uk/
CONTACT hello at orangethief.co.uk
